sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
wrong
, je v določenem položaju ali témi, o kateri govorimo, nezadovoljivo.

seg.quote: The front door was unlocked—something was wrong.
There was nothing wrong with his eyesight.
I'm afraid I'll make the wrong decision.

sense.def:
To be wrong about something
pomeni, da tisto, kar o nečem rečemo ali mislimo, ni pravilno.

seg.quote: We had to admit the possibility that we might be wrong.
She supposed, wrongly, that the other two agreed with her.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj, kar počnemo,
wrong
, je slabo ali neetično.

seg.quote: You were wrong to speak to the newspapers first.

sense.def:
Izraz
wrong
uporabljamo za dejanja, ki so slaba ali neetična.

seg.quote: Any good parent feels strongly about right and wrong.

sense.def:
A wrong
je nepravično dejanje ali položaj.

seg.quote: In a democracy wrongs should be righted by the vote and not by violence.

sense.def:
To wrong someone
pomeni z nekom ravnati grdo ali nepravično;

Tista stran tkanine ali papirja, ki je
wrong
, bi morala biti obrnjena navznoter ali navzdol in se ne bi smela videti.

To get something wrong
pomeni narediti napako.

seg.quote: I think she got his name wrong.

sense.def:
To go wrong
pomeni narediti napako.

Kadar nekaj
goes wrong
, preneha delovati ali ni več uspešno.

seg.quote: Their relationship went wrong after the birth of their child.

sense.def:
To be in the wrong
pomeni, da je tisto, kar počnemo, neetično ali nedovoljeno.
